channel.title: "The System Cannot Find The Source Specified"
channel.description:
Help? It's With my compiler it says that can someone just help me :o?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2010, 06:24:18 pm[/size][hr]New Problem:
My Runserver Bat.
When I open it it sits there and dosent load anything and than a bunch of words pop up and it closes any help with this?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2010, 06:30:52 pm[/size][hr]Someone help me -.-

item.title: "The System Cannot Find The Source Specified"
item.dc:creator: @fivescape2200 fivescape2200
item.description:
@fivescape2200 wrote:

can you write me the whole runserver code this is mine:

@ECHO OFF
color 81
title Your Server Name Here Client
start http://jvmworld.smfforfree3.com
echo Your Server JVM WORLD CLIENT
echo Made by Owner Five
JAVA -Xmx500m EGUI

where do i put the JDK

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 13, 2010, 07:26:03 pm[/size][hr]Rawr Help Me!

Read full topic
item.source: "The System Cannot Find The Source Specified"

item.title: "The System Cannot Find The Source Specified"
item.dc:creator: @Facepalm Facepalm
item.description:
@Facepalm wrote:

In your source folder/client folder you need to right click the runserver or rune client and click edit. then on the first or second line it should say JDK 6_0_1-17. Change the number that is 1-17 to whatever number JDK you have. For example if your JDK was update 15 ( which is also 6_0_15 ) you would change it to that in you runserver/client in edit.

Read full topic
